short: Adds data set(s) to the repository.
name: add

params.<repository path>: Absolute or relative path to the repository.

params.<file/folder>: Absolute or relative path to the file or folder defining the data set to be added.

params.--description <description>: A description of the data set. The maximum length is restricted to 1000 characters. It does not contain any ISO control character like TAB, CR, or LF.

params.--move: The data set is moved into the repository. Otherwise it is copied.

params.--verbose: Shows progress information in case of copying mode. The number of bytes already copied versus the total number of bytes to be copied will be shown.
